name: Jumpcore: Check Yourself
description: Jumpcore - is a game built on the basis of the speed of a runner in which you overcome obstacles such as spikes or saws. The only advantage of the game is to advance as far as possible. Or compete with one another on their cards each time a randomly generated. The game consists entirely of minimalism, which lets focus on how to have time to go to the time - it is a struggle against reaction and hands.
